You can now track the current status in India directly from chrome. We have a simulation for you to understand the importance of lockdown. Though we aren't official, we collect the data from the highly valued resources below.

Update:
Added daily comparison for actively tracking the growth rate of covid 19.

Thanks to https://github.com/amodm/api-covid19-in and the volunteers of covid19india.org for providing the required data 

Fork me on https://github.com/pijushcs/covid19india
